data.name: Simple Tools
data.detailed_description:
This simple tool integrates many useful functions into the tool library
The window panel is simple and comfortable, and users will not feel that the software is complicated

Auto click tool for the best work. It can meet the needs of many users and is suitable for building games and repeating the operation process
If you are using a web game in a browser, try to use the connection function for multiple requests, it may make the browser work and cause no effect
Its functions also include screen recognition to automatically click on the specified screen position after finding the picture, and record the keyboard and mouse of all user operations.
The recording file can be played in a loop, it will simulate all the previous operations of the user, only smart people know how to save time
You can also use it to check your keyboard device, how many keys it supports at the same time, and even observe the mouse status
This is a great help for those who like to play music games osu!mania mode

Video tutorial for simple tools, maybe the author will be lazy and not update the video
Contributed to AcFun in China, anchor name [Fallen Angel Longlong][uid:53880282]

data.short_description: Gadget: suitable for use in building games, FPS shooting games, games that repeat the operation process
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, French, Russian, Portuguese, German, Spanish - Spain
